channel.title: What is wrong with this code?

item.title: What is wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Lol…

[code]case 10284:
if (playerHasItemAmount(2349, 1)==true) // bronze
{
deleteItem(2349, GetItemSlot(2349), 1);
addItem(436, 1);
sendMessage(“You slowly open the Brother’s chest…”);
sendMessage("…you grab an item and mysteriously get teleported away.");
addItem(Item2.randomVerac(), 1);
heightLevel = 0;
startAnimation(862);
}
break;

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: What is wrong with this code?

item.title: What is wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

case 10284:
if (objectID == 10284) // Barrows Chest
if (playerHasItemAmount(2349, 1)==true) // bronze
{
deleteItem(2349, GetItemSlot(2349), 1);
addItem(436, 1);
{
sendMessage(“You slowly open the Brother’s chest…”);
sendMessage("…you grab an item and mysteriously get teleported away.");
addItem(Item2.randomVerac(), 1);
heightLevel = 0;
startAnimation(862);
}

Yes this is added in the object cases.
